abstract: Ohio Gov John R Kasich is rising in Republican presidential primary polls in New Hampshire, gaining support from voters who were impressed with his debate performance; his surge could have significant ripple effect on GOP primary in state and beyond.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kasich is rising in the polls in New Hampshire, winning endorsements and drawing new voters to his appearances who were impressed with his debate performance.

headline.main: John Kasich’s Appeal to Moderates Gains Traction in New Hampshire
headline.print_headline: Centrist Streak Offers Kasich an Opening

snippet: Gov. John Kasich is rising in the polls in New Hampshire, winning endorsements and drawing new voters to his appearances who were impressed with his debate performance.
